metadata.title: CVE-2021-23180 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in htmldoc in v1.9.12 and before. Null pointer dereference in file_extension(),in file.c may lead to execute arbitrary code and denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-23180` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.11-4
htmldoc-common - 1.9.11-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.11-4').
